title: Step 36

challengeFiles.name: index
styles

tests.text: You should add two div elements as the first children of .foreground-buildings.
You should add one div element between .fb2 and .fb3.
You should add two div elements as the last children of .foreground-buildings.

description: Squeeze the buildings together again by adding two empty div elements within both the top and bottom of the .foreground-buildings element, and one more in between .fb2 and .fb3.
